channel.title: GiveAdmin Command
channel.description: I don't know how to get an giveadmin command i have googled and i came out with no result can someone help me? im running a 317 server

item.title: GiveAdmin Command
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Laythe:

Because he has asked for something different.

Well I looked over the thread and he said he wants to be the only one able to do the command but you just made it so anyone who has a player rights of 3 able to do it, whereas I already posted it, so you still haven’t given him what he asked for and you are just reposting what I posted.

item.title: GiveAdmin Command
item.dc:creator: @Laythe Laythe
item.description:
@Laythe wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && (playerRights == 3)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                p.playerRights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(playerName + " has made you aan Admin!");
                sendMessage("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Admin!");
            } else {
                sendMessage("The name doesnt exist.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Incorrect syntax");
        }
    }[/code]

Sorry, that should work.

Read full topic

item.title: GiveAdmin Command
item.dc:creator: @Laythe Laythe
item.description:
@Laythe wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && (playerRights == 3)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                p.playerRights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(playerName + " has made you aan Admin!");
                sendMessage("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Admin!");
            } else {
                sendMessage("The name doesnt exist.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Incorrect syntax");
        }
    }
}[/code]

That makes it so only players with player-rights 3 can give administrator to others by using that command.

Read full topic

item.title: GiveAdmin Command
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[code] PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;

        writeLog(p.playerName, "character-rights");

character-rights = 2;[/code]

Really?

Here:

if(playerRights > 2) { if (command.startsWith("giveadmin")) { int locatedIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(10)); if (locatedIndex != -1) { client player = (client)server.playerHandler.players[locatedIndex]; player.playerRights = 2; sendMessage("Player " + player.playerName + " is an admin now."); } else { sendMessage("Cannot locate player."); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: GiveAdmin Command
item.dc:creator: @Laythe Laythe
item.description:
@Laythe wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights > 2
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;

        writeLog(p.playerName, "character-rights");

character-rights = 2;
sM(“You have given administrator position to “+p.playerName+”.”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
}[/code]

I think that’s how you do it, sorry I just made that in notepad trying to remember the methods.

Read full topic
